name: Explorateur
overview: A French language Lander game coded entirely in BASIC for the C64 by Norbert Bonnefoy . Published by Editions Mondiales S.A. in their French gaming magazine TILT. TILT No49 Decembre 1987. (program listing starting on page 184). Controls are keyboard only and use the keys 1 (left), 2 (right), and F7 (thrust).
